Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:夏

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+590F

Main pronunciation 主要发音: xià

Other pronunciations 其它发音: xià,jiǎ

Original meaning 本义: Meaning Dynasty name now meaning summer.

English senses 英语理解: summer; great, grand, big

Usage example 用法举例: 夏天 xià tiān (summer)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 892

Shuowen 说文解字: 中國之人也從夊從頁從臼臼兩手夊兩足也

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Component 夏 from 夓 from person-head 頁 yè and bottom-foot 夂夊 zhǐ-suī and two-hands 𦥑 jú and sun-day 日 rì. (name- walking-summer 夏 xià)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- the early versions had a man and sun and indicated summer) (- later versions had no sun, indicated xia dynasty c. 2070-1600 BCE)

夓字的基本解释

夓
xià
古同“夏”。

夓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xià］
［《廣韻》胡雅切，上馬，匣。］
“夓1”的今字。“昰2”的今字。
(1)大。
(2)大屋；大殿。
(3)五色。
(4)古代汉民族自称，也称华夏、诸夏。
(5)指中夏，中原地区。
(6)禹乐名。
(7)泛指大乐歌。
(8)舞名。文舞。
(9)水名。夏水。传说此水冬竭夏流，故名。故道从湖北省沙市东南分长江水东出，流经今监利县北，折东北至沔阳县治附近入汉水。
(10)水名。汉水的别称。
(11)佛教语。僧徒称年为夏。
(12)朝代名，即夏后氏。是我国历史上第一个朝代。相传为禹子启所创立的奴隶制国家。建都安邑（今山西省夏县北）。
(13)封建割据政权或农民起义政权称号。东晋末，公元407年，匈奴贵族赫连勃勃称天王大单于，国号夏。也称大夏。建都统万城（今陕西省横山西北）。
(14)封建割据政权或农民起义政权称号。隋末农民起义领袖窦建德于公元618年自立为王，国号夏。初建都乐寿（今河北省献县），次年迁洛州（今河北省永年东南）。
(15)封建割据政权或农民起义政权称号。北宋仁宗时，

Basic explanation of words
夓
xià
Ancient Tong "Xia".
夓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xià］
["Guangyun" Hu Yaqie, on horse, box. ]
The present word for "夓1". The modern word for "is 2".
(1) Big.
(2) The big house; the hall.
(3) Five colors.
(4) The ancient Han people called themselves, also called Huaxia and Zhuxia.
(5) Refers to Zhongxia, the Central Plains region.
(6) Yule name.
(7) Refers to big music songs in general.
(8) Dance name. Wen Wu.
(9) Water name. Xia Shui. Legend has it that this water runs out in winter and flows in summer, hence the name. The old road divides the Yangtze River from the southeast of Shashi, Hubei Province out of the Yangtze River, flows through the north of Jianli County, turning northeast to the Han River near Mianyang County.
(10) The name of the water. Another name for Hanshui.
(11) Buddhist language. The monks call the year summer.
(12) The name of the dynasty, namely Xiahoushi. It was the first dynasty in the history of our country. According to legend, it was a slavery country founded by Yu Ziqi. Built the capital Anyi (now north of Xia County, Shanxi Province).
(13) The title of feudal separatist regime or peasant uprising regime. At the end of the Eastern Jin Dynasty, in 407 AD, Helianbo, a noble of the Huns, was called the King of Heaven and the country was named Xia. Also called Daxia. The capital was built in Wancheng (now northwest of Hengshan, Shaanxi Province).
(14) The title of feudal separatist regime or peasant uprising regime. Dou Jiande, leader of the peasant uprising at the end of the Sui Dynasty, established himself as king in 618 AD, and his country was named Xia. Le Shou (now Xian County, Hebei Province) was first built, and it moved to Luozhou the following year (now Yongnian Southeast, Hebei Province).
(15) The title of feudal separatist regime or peasant uprising regime. During Renzong of the Northern Song Dynasty,
